page.title: 05Tourism, Leisure
page.content: Lots of{tourists}come every year on Bank holidays and weekends. They go to the Cavendish Pavilion, to the Priory, and the car parks. People play games, sun bathe, swim in the river ,walk, take photos etc. The local people go to the{Devonshire {Arms}to play games and drink and talk. Some people play{cricket}or{fish.} When the{village hall}has things on people go to take part. The things they have on are markets, exhibitions, dances, and pantomimes, drama, badminton, meetings, and W.I. Local people often go to the towns and other places for{concerts.
